text: Andrej Lukić (; born 2 April 1994) is a Croatian footballer who plays in Moldova for Sheriff Tiraspol on loan from Portuguese club Braga. ==Club career== Lukić made his Croatian First Football League debut for Osijek on 20 October 2012 in a game against Zadar. On 21 August 2018, he joined Apollon Smyrni on a season-long loan from Braga. On 1 August 2019, he joined Moldovan club Sheriff Tiraspol on loan. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1994 births Category:People from Nova Gradiška Category:Association football defenders Category:Croatian footballers Category:NK Osijek players Category:HNK Cibalia players Category:S.C. title: Andrej Lukić
